item.title: Obtaining Bitbucket Repository Events in Real Time via the generic-webhook-trigger Plugin
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: This article describes how to use Jenkins’ generic-webhook-trigger plugin to obtain real-time event information from a Bitbucket repository, such as the Pull Request ID.

item.title: Bitbucket Webhooks Configuration
item.author: xianpeng.shen@gmail.com (Xianpeng Shen)
item.description: How to configure Bitbucket webhooks to trigger Jenkins builds for multi-branch pipelines, ensuring that Jenkins can automatically respond to events like pull requests and branch updates.
